definition: radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
and even/to go so far as to
equivalent to either 是[shi4] or 就是[jiu4 shi4]
Nêdong county, Tibetan: Sne gdong rdzong, in Lhokha prefecture 山南地區|山南地区[Shan1 nan2 di4 qu1], Tibet
Nêdong county, Tibetan: Sne gdong rdzong, in Lhokha prefecture 山南地區|山南地区[Shan1 nan2 di4 qu1], Tibet
Jeminay county or Jéminey nahiyisi in Altay prefecture 阿勒泰地區|阿勒泰地区[A1 le4 tai4 di4 qu1], Xinjiang
Jeminay county or Jéminey nahiyisi in Altay prefecture 阿勒泰地區|阿勒泰地区[A1 le4 tai4 di4 qu1], Xinjiang
Nathu La (Himalayan pass on Silk Road between Tibet and Indian Sikkim)
Nathu La (Himalayan pass on Silk Road between Tibet and Indian Sikkim)

sentences.chinese: 希望乃憂戚之最佳音樂。

sentences.english: The fundamentality of happiness lies in the choice of lifestyles.
sentences.chinese: 而幸福問題的根本，乃在於生活方式的選擇。

sentences.english: He picks it up, discovers it is a hanged ghost's reeking rope, and keeps it.
sentences.chinese: 秋崖拾來一看，乃一麻繩，意必縊鬼之物。

sentences.english: For the kingdom of God is not in word, but in power.
sentences.chinese: 因爲神的國不在乎言語，乃在乎權能。

sentences.english: The human dress is forged iron.
The glory of youths is their strength, but the beauty of the aged is their gray hair.
sentences.chinese: 強壯乃少年人的榮耀，白髮爲老年人的尊容。

sentences.english: The horse is made ready for the day of battle, but victory rests with the Lord .
sentences.chinese: 馬是爲打仗之日預備的，得勝乃在乎耶和華。

sentences.english: When Moses was at Mount Sinai God chose to reveal his face.
sentences.chinese: 摩西在西乃山上時，上帝定意顯明祂的面。

sentences.english: Markets go up, and markets go down.
This holy image of the Dragon King came down to me from Guru Chen.
sentences.chinese: 此龍王聖像乃陳上師留傳下來給我的。

sentences.english: Glorious things are spoken of thee, O city of God. Selah.
sentences.chinese: 神的城阿，有榮耀的事乃指着你說的。

sentences.english: Taoism has its beginning in Han-Wei-Jin period.
sentences.chinese: 漢魏晉乃道教開端的時代。

sentences.english: The town has a population of 14,000.
sentences.chinese: 澤家鎮乃新欣欣九年制學校轄總人口14000人。

sentences.english: Wang Fuzhi was the synthesizer of ideologies of body philosophy in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 王夫之乃中國古代身體哲學思想的集其大成者。

sentences.english: Such rigorous lack of feature-creep is rare.
sentences.chinese: 這種缺乏特徵蠕動的產品乃罕見之作。

sentences.english: In fact the literature of Wuzhong is the inevitable outcome of the Chinese literature.
sentences.chinese: 其實，吳中文學乃中國文學史發展之必然結果。

definition: classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
that being the case/then/in that case
